7.2.1 Existence of recommendations
National recommendations on physical activity during the reproductive years have, to some extent, been 
adopted by more than one third of Member States in the WHO European Region (19 countries; 36%). 
Recommendations on physical activity are provided for the preconception and/or postpartum periods by 
around one quarter of Member States (14 countries; 26%), while more than one third (18 countries; 34%)
